articles.title: Parliament to review ethics code after Mkhize got off on a technicality - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Parliament’s ethics committee has established a subcommittee to review the MPs' code of ethics after former health minister Dr Zweli Mkhize was let off the hook on a technicality in the Digital Vibes scandal.
